# Harrow on the Hill (ward)

| electorate =

Harrow on the Hill is an electoral ward in the London Borough of Harrow. The ward was first used in the 2022 elections and elects three councillors to Harrow London Borough Council. It was previously used between 1978 and 2002.
Geography
The ward is named after Harrow on the Hill.
